recipesJson.name: Alonel Cream
recipesJson.author: sodakdave
recipesJson.description: A creamy vape reminiscent of Lenola Cream. NOT A CLONE

reviews.text: This is a really enjoyable recipe. The mouthfeel is thick and lush and the fruit is subtle and addictive. I have no idea how close it is to LC, I only know I'll definitely be mixing this again!
